Title: Relates to bias related criminal activity
Summary: Proscribes conduct constituting a bias related crime, meaning for such purposes, the commission of a designated act that demonstrates a prejudice based on the race, color, religion, national origin, age, ethnicity, disability, gender or sexual orientation of the victim; denies the granting of youthful offender status for any offender committing such a crime.
LawCode: Add Art 491 ยง491.00, Pen L; amd ยง720.10, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to bias related crime
